main event: A witness observed a bright, glowing, oval-shaped object in the sky over Tolland, Massachusetts in July 1968.
interesting points: The object was seen at high altitude and moved at a high rate of speed, disappearing to the west.
The object was visible for approximately 2 minutes and did not make any sound.
The witness reported that the object was not a plane or any known aircraft.
The witness sketched the object as having a somewhat triangular shape with no distinct lights or colors.
The witness described the object as a 'haze unnatural in appearance' in the sky.
